text: Did trapit sign off on which parts are static and which parts are dynamic content?   There is quite a bit of static so I just want to be sure.  recalling David saying at ont point they wanted things like the address to be in the CMS.
they did

ok thanks

text: I’m thinking about this for the “Get a Free Demo” modal that would pop up when you click the green button in the main nav
interesting
and if we went that route it would change the in-page form as well… or rather we’d probably get rid of the in-page form

but I do like it right now
same
we could A/B test it
true
